snippet: Despite an influx of coal projects, poverty rates remain stubbornly high, raising tough questions about whether Africa’s resource boom can effectively raise the standards of living of its people.
abstract: Poverty rates in Mozambique remain stubbornly high, despite influx of coal projects,  raising tough questions about whether Africa's resource boom can effectively raise standards of living of its people.
lead_paragraph: Despite an influx of coal projects, poverty rates remain stubbornly high, raising tough questions about whether Africa’s resource boom can effectively raise the standards of living of its people.

headline.seo: As Coal Boosts Mozambique, The Rural Poor Are Left Behind
headline.main: As Coal Boosts Mozambique, the Rural Poor Are Left Behind
headline.print_headline: As Coal Boosts Mozambique, The Rural Poor Are Left Behind
